\t Dr Sandesh Ahir is practicing as a Dental Surgeon since 2012. He has a well-equipped clinic with the latest technology instruments and infrastructure and is one of the best in the city.

\t Dr Sandesh Ahir received his formal dental education from Terna Dental college, Nerul, Navi Mumbai. He has got advanced training in comprehensive restorative and cosmetic dentistry and implantology. He is active member of Indian Dental Association. He has updated his knowledge constantly over the years by attending all the Continuing Education Program conducted by IDA which have provided him greater skills and exceptional expertise in the latest dental procedures and technology.

\t I believe in excellence and have dedicated myself, my talents and my creative abilities to assure the successful accomplishment of any company goals. My positive attitude and willingness to give 100% makes me a valuable asset to any organization that would employ me. I am confident that my skills will be an asset and have a favorable impact in your organization.
3, Vaikunth Darshan, Opp. Sai nagar Ground, Sai Nagar, Ambadi Road, Vasai Road(W). 401202.
Be a Proud Member of our (ACFC) AhirOdents Cavity Free Club and avail the exclusive benefit of FREE CHECKUP AND CONSULTATION on every visit.
Just visit the link below and put your valuable review on our Profile and a Lovely Like.
Quality over Quantity - We prefer to deliver high quality care to a limited number of patients a day than dilute the quality of care by taking in more patients a day.
Friendly environment, calm and soothing atmosphere of operating area. A unique approach towards anxious and apprehensive patients.

Strict Sterilization Protocol - We understand the dangers of cross infection. So we strictly adhere to the international protocol of infection control and sterilization to protect you from cross infection.

A picture is worth a thousand words. Our patients love our Intra oral camera – you get to see first hand and up close the state of your teeth, including any problems such as cracked teeth, decay, worn-out or defective fillings, bleeding gums and plaque.

RVG - digital radiovisiography is the latest X-ray technology in dentistry. Reduced radiation of the patient compared with classic X-ray up to 80% Faster imaging without X-ray film and developing images Immediate imaging on the computer screen High quality of the digital imaging Saving images in the patient file
Metal free ZIRCONIA Crowns And Bridges. Natural appearance High-precision fitting Durability Metal free and hypo-allergenic
Tooth coloured Composite fillings instead of old black colored Silver Amalgam filling. No acid etching for tooth coloured fillings. No silver cones in Root Canal Treatment.
